pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.1.2: “Tonics” renders _bhesajja_. In this rule the only _bhesajjas_ mentioned are the five standard tonics. I consequently assume that this is the main meaning of _bhesajja_ in this rule.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.7: According ACMC, p.18, one _doṇa_ is equivalent to 64 handfuls. This is perhaps roughly equivalent to one litre.
